definition: to tear down/to demolish/to dismantle/to remove
to tear open/to tear down/to tear apart/to open
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including

sentences.english: His house was dismantled of all its furniture.
sentences.chinese: 他們房子的傢俱全被拆除了。

sentences.english: The old bridge was last week .
sentences.chinese: 那座舊橋上個星期被拆除了。

sentences.english: When the aura of birth or plan to dismantle suture cesarean section.
sentences.chinese: 當出現了臨產先兆或計劃施行剖宮產時再拆除縫線。

sentences.english: because this very old factory is about to be demolished in 2012.
sentences.chinese: 因爲2012年這個老工廠就要被拆除了。

sentences.english: Two big gate constructions were demolished by use of directional controlled blasting.
sentences.chinese: 採用定向控制爆破方法拆除兩座大門樓。

sentences.english: Will those old schools be pulled down next week?
sentences.chinese: 那些老校是在下週拆除嗎？

sentences.english: Most "fake" virus samples were removed, as well as "garbage" files.
sentences.chinese: 最“假”病毒樣本以及“垃圾”文件將被拆除。

sentences.english: A second bomb was found and defused near the scene of the blast.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸點附近發現的第二枚炸彈已被拆除。

sentences.english: If any ring were removed, they would all come apart.
sentences.chinese: 如果其中任何一個環被拆除，它們才都會來分開。

sentences.english: Simons. Everything of African-American heritage has been torn down.
sentences.chinese: 所有的非裔美國人遺產都被拆除了。

sentences.english: He fought tooth and nail to stop the county from pulling down the old church.
sentences.chinese: 他竭力阻止縣裏拆除那座老教堂。

sentences.english: After the fixed orthodontics was over, the occurrence of enamel demineralization was observed.
sentences.chinese: 待矯治結束拆除矯治裝置後觀察釉質脫礦的發生情況。

sentences.english: These now are the walls we must tear down.
sentences.chinese: 現在到了我們必須拆除這些牆的時候了。

sentences.english: They have razed those buildings to make way for the new highway.
sentences.chinese: 他們拆除了那些建築物以便騰出地方修建新的公路。

sentences.english: Antibacterial gel pumps have been removed from the prison as a precautionary measure.
sentences.chinese: 作爲“預防措施”抗病菌凝膠泵已被拆除。”

sentences.english: In this paper, the demolition of an office building with controlled blasting is briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了原北京帶鋼廠辦公樓的控制爆破拆除。

definition: abbr. for 違章建築|违章建筑, illegal construction
to build (esp. with simple materials)/to knock together (a temporary shed)/to rig up
to demolish a building and relocate the inhabitants
to tear open/to tear down/to tear apart/to open
to repair/to refurbish/to renovate/to refit/to mend/to rebuild
to suppress/to crack down on/to prohibit
(of a power plant, refinery etc) to shut down
to finish work/to complete a project
